roles.name: Tour Guide
roles.description: Conducts guided experiences, sharing knowledge about local culture, history, or nature, and ensures visitor engagement and safety.

meta.typicalBackground: Local expertise, language skills, strong storytelling and interpersonal abilities
keyTools: Guide scripts, route planning, interpretive materials, first-aid kit
challenges: Managing diverse groups, ensuring accurate info, seasonality of tourism flows

sampleUseCase.scenario: A tour guide leads a heritage walk in an ancient city, weaving in local legends and vantage points for photography, receiving high traveler ratings on review sites.

roles.name: Hotel Manager
roles.description: Oversees accommodation operations, managing staff, reservations, guest experiences, and budget performance.

meta.typicalBackground: Hospitality management education, strong leadership, revenue management skills
challenges: Competition from peer-to-peer rentals, maintaining consistent service, reviews impacting reputation

sampleUseCase.scenario: A manager implements yield management software and upsells room upgrades, raising average daily rate (ADR) by 10% during the peak travel season.

roles.name: Travel Agent
roles.description: Advises and arranges travel packages, flights, accommodations, and experiences for individuals or groups, tailoring itineraries to client preferences.

meta.typicalBackground: Travel/tourism diploma, knowledge of GDS (Global Distribution Systems), strong sales approach
challenges: Online competition (OTAs), visa/travel restrictions, last-minute client changes or cancellations

sampleUseCase.scenario: A travel agent organizes a custom honeymoon package across multiple islands, ensuring smooth ferry connections and exclusive resort deals, receiving glowing client testimonials.

roles.name: Destination Marketer
roles.description: Promotes a region or country to potential visitors, highlighting attractions, cultural events, and unique experiences through campaigns and partnerships.

meta.typicalBackground: Marketing or tourism background, knowledge of digital campaigns, influencer marketing, brand building
keyTools: Social media ads, destination websites, travel expo presentations
challenges: Competition from other destinations, limited marketing budgets, measuring campaign ROI in tourism flows

sampleUseCase.scenario: The marketer collaborates with popular travel bloggers and organizes a virtual press trip, spiking destination interest and bookings by 25% during off-peak months.

roles.name: Sustainable Tourism Advisor
roles.description: Guides tourism businesses or governments on eco-friendly, community-oriented practices, balancing visitor growth with minimal environmental impact.

meta.typicalBackground: Sustainable development or environmental management, knowledge of GSTC criteria, local community engagement
keyTools: Carbon offset programs, biodiversity conservation plans
challenges: Overcoming overtourism, implementing waste/water management, ensuring local benefit sharing

sampleUseCase.scenario: An advisor helps a coastal resort adopt a reef protection plan, limiting visitor boat traffic, promoting coral-friendly sunscreens, and financing local reef restoration projects.
